Block.Text: {C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}I hate to disappoint you, but you will be going home empty handed.{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Well, well. {Name}{C1} once again...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}And what can I do for you today? Back for some more torment, are you?{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}...I suppose I can indulge you. Come, to the battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Well, well. You're stronger than I anticipated.{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Now go, {Name}{C1}. You must never stop moving forward.{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}He would be disappointed in you if you did.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Ah! You know what my brother desires? You must tell us!{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Well...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Why don't you pay him a visit and see for yourself?{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Go. Entertain him...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}Is that it?{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Please don't disappoint me again.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Nixtorm{Color:33}, the kingdom protected by {Color:30}Mitsuhide{Color:33}, is famous for its Ice-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Fire-type, Fighting-type, and Rock-type Pokémon are strong against Ice-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}But Grass-type and Ground-type Pokémon will be pretty vulnerable...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Nixtorm{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So you have made it this far...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Do you know, {Color:30}Mitsuhide{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Do you know what my brother is planning to do?{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}One such as myself could never hope to understand Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But I can assure you that he has only the best intentions.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lady {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}He is your brother. How could you not trust Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Maybe I am a bad sister...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}I just don't...trust him...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}He used to be so kind... But now...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Do you truly believe you can defeat me with such a conflicted heart?{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}...Let us take to the battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}You wish to face me in battle once more?{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Very well. As long as you continue to make Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} your target...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I shall continue to stand in your way!{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}So... It would appear that you truly are capable...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Mitsuhide{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}My brother told me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}He told me that he would destroy Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}I don't know what he meant exactly, but...he terrified me.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}The world is going to change. Just like my brother did...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Lady {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33}, I know not of what you speak.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} is everything to me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}To serve by his side... It is everything I have ever wanted...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}...I must go.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Surely by now you understand. You cannot defeat me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Return to your kingdom, and think hard.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}What is there to be gained from opposing Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...|02,cc{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Finally... The next kingdom is...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Ah!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I always knew you would make it here...{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But you're up against {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} now... You're going to need more than a few party tricks up your sleeve...{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But you're gonna beat him, {Name}{C1}! I just know it!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hehe...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You don't need to worry about me, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Let's go!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are now able to challenge the Warlord of {Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33} to battle.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33}... Finally...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33} is home to lots of Dragon-type Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Ice-type attacks work well against Dragon-type Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}... I believe in you. I know you're going to win!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Kingdom of {Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33}{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lady {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33}! You have returned!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I have returned, {Color:30}Ranmaru{Color:33}... But not in the way that you think.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I'm here as |02,cc{C1}'s friend and ally!{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}Lady {Color:31}Oichi{Color:33}, it is still not too late. I beg you to reconsider.{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:32}You are Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}'s sister, after all...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Enough.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:34}Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I shall not tolerate anyone who attempts to stand in my way.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Even if they are my own flesh and blood...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I had almost grown tired of waiting for you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Now, it is time. Time for {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} to take the final step.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehe... Back again, {Name}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Very well. I shall grind you into the dirt!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Dear brother...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehe...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}{Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}{Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33} is yours.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehehe... Hahahaha!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}What's wrong?{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Surely you need to defeat {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} in order to fulfill your ambition...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}|02,cc{C1}! We've finally united the whole of Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I'm...I'm so happy!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You did it, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}A battle with all of Ransei at stake... What an experience!{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}'s ambition has been thwarted.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...! |02,cc{C1}, look over there!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}, that light just now... What on earth...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}!{Wait:30}20 Could it have been...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Come on, |02,cc{C1}! Let's go to {Color:31}Dragnor{Color:33} Castle to find out!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I think the light was coming from this tower...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}But please, be careful... We have no idea what's going to happen next...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You will not be able to save your game after entering the {Color:32}Infinite Tower{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}It's above us... What could it be...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}There's no turning back now, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Let's go!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}The light was coming from here...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Ah!{Wait:30}20 |02,cc{C1}! Over there!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Link with me... {C1}Show me your strength...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}That's...the legendary Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}My name is Arceus. {C1}Creator of this world...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I have been waiting for you, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}|02,cc{C1}... You...linked with the legendary Pokémon?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}That's amazing... This means...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Not so fast.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}So the legends were true...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hm. Very well.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}But legends can be overcome. With an army mighty enough...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Wha―?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}We meet again, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}But this'll be our last battle... This time...I'm gonna win!{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}My duty is to protect Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}To that end, there is nothing I will not do!{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I did not imagine that we would meet on the battlefield again so soon, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}And yet, if you will insist on standing in Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}'s way...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Such a battle will be a new experience for me. I plan to enjoy it... Thank you, {Name}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}I shall attempt to repay you by keeping your suffering to a minimum...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} always knew that this would happen...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}That is why we are here.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}B-But...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehe...{Wait:30}20 It is time.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Come, {Color:30}Rayquaza{Color:33}, black as night!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}{Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} and {Color:30}Rayquaza{Color:33} shall defeat this legendary Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}And bring destruction to Ransei. For all our sakes...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Dear brother... Why...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Do you not understand?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Throughout the land, {Color:34}Warriors{Color:33} fought endless {Color:34}battles{Color:33}, driven by the quest for the legendary Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}These conflicts continued for years...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And more and more Warriors began to treat their {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33}―their partners―as little more than tools.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Many {Color:34}Warriors{Color:33} lost the ability to feel love for their {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It was for this reason that Nobunaga sought to unite Ransei.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}If he could prove to all that he was the most powerful {Color:34}Warrior{Color:33} in {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Then perhaps all the fighting would stop...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}The legendary Pokémon is just that! A legend! A story made up to frighten children!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}People went to the ends of the earth in search of it...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And yet, even if they managed to get their hands on it, its fearsome power would cause them to lose their minds.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}That is why I will destroy this {Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}The legend that has stolen the very heart of my beloved Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Dear brother...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And yet, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Even before {Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}, you have retained your clarity.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Perhaps you are the one...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Brave Warriors...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I have seen how much you both care for {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I therefore entrust it to your care.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are still young.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}That is why you will not see me again...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Until you are worthy of me.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Farewell.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}After that...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1} returned all the captured castles to their original {Color:34}Warlords{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}They, in turn, agreed, after some discussion, to draw up a set of rules designed to protect the {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33} of Ransei.{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}You fought so hard to capture these castles. Feels like a bit of a waste just giving them back...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}But that's the way {Name}{C1} does things, I suppose.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I hope that one day we may share a battlefield again, {Name}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Goodbye.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}{Name}{C1}! You beat me, fair and square!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}To be honest, though...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I knew from the first time we met that you were gonna do big things.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}And I know what I've gotta do now, too...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Head back to {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33} and start again from scratch!{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Doing battle with you has taught me a great deal, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}The love of a Warrior for their partner Pokémon... The bonds between friends and allies... These are priceless treasures.{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I shall return to {Color:31}Valora{Color:33} and attempt to adhere to these principles that you embody.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}|02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Peace has returned to Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Just as Lord {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} desired...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Thank you. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}...|02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}Ah!{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I thought I should drop by to offer my congratulations.{End}
{C1}{Char:0035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I just can't believe you did it!{End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:32}I...(sob) I can't stop these tears...(sniff){End}
{C1}{Char:0036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:34}Hm? You're crying too, {Color:32}Mitsunari{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0034}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:32}(sniff) Hm? Of course not! Now, come on!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}So everyone's gone...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}But, |02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}I'd like to stay with you, if that's all right...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so, {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} was filled with the laughter{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}of people and {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33} alike.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And, from the top of the Infinite Tower...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Nobunaga looked down at it all, a smile upon his face.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Congratulations, |02,cc{C1}! You've cleared this story!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}But many more adventures lie ahead.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I mean, the stories of all the different Warriors you've met so far are just beginning!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}Oh, but don't worry!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Though your link values will be reset, you'll still keep all your valuable items.{End}
